SELECT PRICE_CONFIG_ID, PRICE_CONFIG_NUMBER, SUBMIT_AUDIT_TIME, PRICE_CONFIG_AUDIT_USER, PRICE_CONFIG_AUDIT_RESULT, PROJECT_ID, PERFORM_AUDIT_TIME, HANDLING_SUGGESTION FROM T_MIGU_PRICE_CONFIG WHERE PRICE_CONFIG_ID= #{priceConfigId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
